original_text: The Lord had said, ‘The whole land will become like a desert, but I will not completely destroy it. The Lord had said, ‘The whole land will become like a desert, but I will not completely destroy it. The Lord had said,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시길 이 온 땅이 황폐할 것이나 내가 진멸하지는 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The whole land will become like a desert
but I will not completely destroy it
